item.title: Charles Griffes - Piano Sonata (1917-18)
item.description: [[ECLECTICISM; synthesis of musical styles & genres]] â€” shows a break from style and approach of his earlier works, being dissonant and devoid of programme or descriptive title, yet in three movements with the 1st and 3rd being clearly in sonata form, in a unique fusion of both tradition and the new #Griffes
